Text: Gas Prices for OctoberSusan When you get a chance could you please provide the indices for October for the Bazor Ridge Gas Plant Thanks Stevens

Contract Price for Bazor Ridge Enron Contract Cc Susan We have received our statement for September and the price has changed from our original contract and what we have previously been paid The statement shows that we are being paid three different amounts for various volumes rather than the average of the three prices plus I have spoken with Tricia Truong and she suggest I speak to you Also the transportation has changed on the statement Has this changed Is something in error or has the contract changed Thank you Stevens

Bazor Ridge Gas Plant Cc Susan It is my understanding that Enron will not be receiving gas on Destin pipeline in the month of December Therefore we have made arrangements to sale the gas to another party If I have misunderstood the situation please advise Stevens
